newsitem.title: USA: Municipal bond sales total $2.8 bln for next week.
newsitem.headline: Municipal bond sales total $2.8 bln for next week.

text.p: Municipal bond sales for next week are expected to total $2.8 billion in 73 sales, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Negotiated offerings total $2.1 billion in 33 sales, with a $300 million Jefferson County, Ala., issue through Raymond James topping the list.
On the competitive side, 40 sales totaling $746 million are on the schedule. A $450 million North Carolina deal on Wednesday is the largest.

An additional six sales totaling $385 million are on the possible calendar, meaning underwriters have said they may price the bonds Thursday, depending on market conditions. --U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
